text: Save the Children is a very important charity and they desperately need your help in order to help as many children as possible.
Hi, I am interested in giving a donation to them.
that's great! what made you decide?
I care about children and animals the most. I love to donate to them.
As do I.  I think Save the Children can really do some good!
I agree. They are a good organization and I trust them. I would donate a portion of payment to them.
How much do you like to donate to the chartiy now?
I am interested and would like to donate around 0.30 cents to them.
I want you to know that your donation will be directly deducted from your task payment.
Yeah I figured that. But if I can help children in anyway I am willing to do so.
Well, you can donate any amount from 0 to 2 dollars.
I am, Its an obligated duty to help children and animals. I am thinking about 0.30 cents donation.
Remember, we are helping children here.  Is it possible for you do donate more?
it is. If I can give 0.50 cents I feel that is adequate enough.
All of those children are depending on each of us to do our best.  Really dig deep and think before making your decision.
I have really thought about it. I am willing to do any amount from 0.30-0.50
All right. What is your final donation amount?
0.50 cents I am feeling generous today.
okay.  I think that's good!
ok I will give that amount as my donation.
